arts.ttl: Thomas Frank explains what went wrong for Tottenham in pre-season thrashing by Bayern Munich but insists his side will be ready for PSG clash
arts.sum: Thomas Frank admitted Tottenham were well below their best in Thursday evening's 4-0 defeat by Bayern Munich - and suggested a lack of energy was at the heart of the problem.

arts.ttl: 'Thomas knows': Michael Dawson says there's one thing Frank will be painfully aware of as Spurs hammered by Bayern
arts.sum: Michael Dawson has suggested that Tottenham Hotspur manager Thomas Frank has been hit with a truth bomb after Spursâ€™ 4-0 loss to Bayern Munich. Tottenham...

arts.ttl: Tottenham are NOT ready for the Champions League, a new role for a first-team regular and Thomas Frank's possible solution to his No 10 issue - THINGS WE LEARNED from 4-0 defeat at Bayern Munich
arts.sum: Thomas Frank suffered his first defeat as Tottenham boss on Thursday when his team were thrashed by German champions Bayern Munich. ROBERT SUMMERSCALES was watching the action.

arts.ttl: Kane scores but misses penalty against Tottenham
arts.sum: Harry Kane scores a goal - and misses a penalty - against former club Tottenham Hotspur as Bayern Munich win a pre-season friendly 4-0.

arts.ttl: Brilliant Bayern Munich dominate sorry Spurs in resounding victory
arts.sum: Brilliant Bayern Munich dominate a sorry Tottenham Hotspur team on Thursday evening at the Allianz Arena, with the German champions comfortable 4-0 victors.

arts.ttl: Kane scores, misses pen as Bayern thrash Spurs
arts.sum: Harry Kane enjoyed an eventful reunion with his former club, scoring a goal and missing a penalty in Bayern Munich's 4-0 friendly win over Tottenham Hotspur.

arts.ttl: Spurs well beaten by Bayern in final game before PSG showdown
arts.sum: Tottenham ended their pre-season campaign with a dismal defeat at Bayern Munich - who won 4-0 but it should have been a lot, lot more.

arts.ttl: Bayern Munich 4-0 Tottenham: Spurs thumped in final pre-season friendly before UEFA Super Cup
arts.sum: Tottenham concluded their pre-season preparations with a 4-0 loss to Bayern Munich.

arts.ttl: Bayern Munich 4-0 Tottenham Hotspur: Kompany's men run riot against Spurs
arts.sum: Here's how Bayern Munich charged to a 4-0 friendly win over the Europa League champions.

arts.ttl: Bayern Munich vs Tottenham LIVE: Live score, team news and updates as Harry Kane faces his former club and Luis Diaz makes his debit
arts.sum: Follow Mail Sport's live blog of Tottenham against Bayern Munich as Harry Kane takes on his former club and Luis Diaz makes his debut for the German side in a high-profile pre-season friendly.
